title: Interpretation of a dream about a gift for a single woman

preview.html: The interpretation of a gift in a dream has many interpretations according to interpretive scholars in the field of dream interpretation, such as the scholar Ibn Sirin, the scholar Al-Nabulsi, and the researcher Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a gift in a dream: A gift in a dream carries the meaning of good news and surprise for the dreamer, and it is evidence of a lot of good and abundant money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is giving a gift to another person in the dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will create problems for him in his life. Whoever sees in his dream that he is someone he did not know before, and gave him a beautiful gift, this dream indicates that the dreamer will reap good luck and abundant money. God willing. Whoever sees in his dream that he is giving many gifts to someone, this is evidence that the dreamer is a person who wants to fulfill all his desires in life. Whoever sees in his dream that he is receiving many gifts from a group of people, this is evidence that the dreamer A good person who is loved by his family and relatives. Whoever sees in his dream a large amount of beautiful gifts, this is a warning from God to the dreamer to pay attention to all the matters of his life and fulfill all his desires. Whoever sees in his dream that someone gave you a gift and you opened it, but you did not like the gift, this is evidence However, the dreamer will be deceived by someone he knows. Whoever sees in his dream that he received a gift and the gift was (a book), this is evidence because the dreamer will receive good and enjoyable news from someone he knows. Whoever sees in his dream that he received a gift which is chocolate, this is evidence of That the dreamer will have a very successful trade and job from which he will earn a lot of money and food (and God knows best). Interpretation of the gift in the dream by the scholar (Ibn Sirin): The great scholar Ibn Sirin said about the gift in the dream that he is a good person and shows kindness and tenderness, and it shows the dreamer’s great kindness and satisfaction of all His desires. As for the gift of gold in the dream, it is good news, and that the dreamer will give him a lot of money and abundant sustenance. The perfume in the dream is in the form of a gift, and this is evidence of the kind words that people say about the dreamer. But if the perfume bottle breaks, this is undesirable and indicates That there is someone who utters bad words to the dreamer about his honor and honour. While the Holy Qur’an in a dream in the form of a gift is one of the most beautiful gifts in dreams and in reality. This dream indicates that something happy will happen and that God has separated him from sin and immorality and that God, Blessed and Almighty, has chosen for him The path of goodness (and God knows best). Interpretation of a dream about a gift for a single woman: A gift in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates her imminent marriage and also indicates the great goodness that will come her way. And whoever sees in her dream that someone she knows gave her a beautiful gift, and this person is young and single, then this The dream indicates that this young man wants to marry her. Interpretation of a gift for a married woman in a dream: A gift in a dream for a married woman brings good news, and if she does not have children, God bless her and she has children. It also announces ample and great provision for her household and her husband, God willing, the Almighty. And for interpretation Different dream, you can use Live Dream Interpretation app.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a message from the dead in a dream

preview.html: Receiving a letter from a dead person in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a message on the mobileInterpretation of a dream about a paper letterInterpretation of a letter in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a letter from the deadInterpretation of death in a dreamReceiving a letter in a dreamI dreamed that my dead grandmother was calling meIn general, the dead in a dream show our desire to communicate with them, because you often have a love relationship With them, for example, they may be family members and you feel very sad about their loss, and the dream helps you with that. To communicate with them. Interpretation of receiving a message from a dead person in a dream. Receiving a message from a dead person in the dreamer’s dream indicates getting rid of problems that appeared in his professional life a long time ago, but receiving a message from the dead in a dream means that the dreamer will not be able to restore his normal position due to the great damage that he caused. He will be exposed to it. Seeing that you receive a letter from the deceased means that you are considering obtaining support and assistance from the person who did not have much experience in his professional life, so you should return your decisions to work and choose partners with experience in your field. Work. The vision also indicates that the dreamer will lose many opportunities to achieve profit and broad living. Interpretation of a message from the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever dreams that he is standing behind an imam praying for the dead, he is attending a meeting in which they are praying for the dead. The dream may indicate a message from death: to give up something Whatever your life, death often represents the beginning or end of something. If you dream of a specific person who conveys a specific message to you, then you need to let go of something related to that person. Dead people in a dream indicate our desire to communicate with them, because you often have a love relationship with them, as they may be, for example, a family member They feel very sad about their loss, and the dream helps you communicate. Dreaming of a message from death can indicate that you need to let go of something in your life as death often represents the beginning or end of something. Asking you about your situation and what is happening to you means that you need to have this person in your life. Dream of a message from the dead in a dream – YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a nose in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a nose in a dream by Ibn Sirin The nose is an important organ among the organs of the human body. It is one of the most prominent organs on the face, and its shape varies from one person to another due to the nasal bones and nasal cartilages that work to form the nose. Genetic factors also play an important role in the shape of the nose. The length and size of the nose varies from person to person, and the difference includes differences between the sexes. Men's noses are larger than women's noses. The nose represents the functional role of the respiratory system, which is one of the most important organs of the body, and many people want to know the interpretation of the dream of cutting off the nose in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, and the following interpretations about it. Interpretation of the dream of cutting off the nose for single people. Visions differ from one person to another, and this is due to many issues that have been agreed upon by dream interpreters scholars. Based on which interpretations were suggested according to the condition of the viewer in the dream, the following is the interpretation of a dream about cutting off a single woman’s nose: Seeing a dream about cutting off an unmarried girl’s nose means that she will go through difficult and harsh circumstances that will lead her to oppression and a feeling of injustice and misery. If an unmarried girl sees that her nose is cut off in... Her dream, it means that she cannot face her life and overcome her problems. Seeing a severed nose in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that there are many challenges, difficulties, and fears that will fill her life. Seeing a severed nose for an unmarried woman means that she will fail to achieve her goals or achieve what she wants See also: Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his wife in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of radioactive contamination. The nose in a dream. The nose is one of the important and indispensable parts of the body, because it has a major role in introducing and renewing air into the body, and like the rest of the body parts it is exposed to damage or danger. Seeing the nose injured With something unpleasant, it means that the dreamer suffers a lot in his life and commits some bad deeds and wrongdoings, and he must re-examine himself and return to God with sincere repentance and stop his heinous deeds. An injury to the nose may indicate that the dreamer is suffering from a serious illness and may be exposed to a healthy intestine that will affect him negatively. Seeing An injury to the nose suggests that the dreamer is planning for others and that his life will be upended and revealed through what he is planning for others. If the dreamer sees that his nose is injured and blood is bleeding from it; Because he committed some sins and earned money illegally. An injured nose in a dream indicates excessive fatigue and lack of comfort in one’s life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about many birds in the sky by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about an injured nose for a married woman. Women in the field of dream interpretation have many cases, due to differences in Her status in terms of marriage or not, or whether she is pregnant, divorced, widowed, or other. Each dream has been interpreted according to the situation and the following is the interpretation. About a dream about a wounded nose for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that her nose is injured, this indicates the seriousness of her suffering from worries, anxieties, problems, and misfortunes that affect her negatively. A dream about a wounded nose for a married woman indicates that she will go through difficult financial and living conditions. Seeing a married woman in Her dream indicates that the nose

title: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, letter Kha

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of dreams from Ibn Sirin, the letter Kha, via the website on dreams. Learn about the meanings and symbols of dreams from Ibn Sirin, the letter Kha, and all the words that begin with the letter Kha. Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, the letter Khajris: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, the letter “Kha’ is the seal” in a dream. It is a sign of strength and security and may indicate a wife. It has been said that it is a sign of money and may indicate a male child born to him. Pregnant woman. Vegetables: Seeing vegetables, may God bless him and grant him peace, is a great blessing, as it indicates cheapness after high prices and an indication of the safety of the afflicted. It has been said that seeing pot, peace be upon him, is a sign of longevity and Hajj. Baker: Seeing a baker in a dream means prosperity and perhaps a sign of love. A loaf of bread: Seeing white bread in a dream is a sign of eating money. As for bread that tastes bitter, it indicates a bitter life, and if the bread is sweet, it indicates high prices. Get: The cheek in a dream shows what makes a person beautiful, and the cheek that It contains dirt or dust that can indicate humiliation. Khadija: Seeing Mrs. Khadija, may God be pleased with her, the wife of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, is a sign of joy for the Prophet and a decent life. Sheep: Seeing a sheep in a dream indicates the presence of an obedient male child, and small animals in the dream indicate On the concerns of its owners, and it is said that slaughtering a sheep in a dream indicates the death of a child in the family. Interpretation of dreams, letter Kha Khashhab: Wood in a dream is a sign of hypocrisy, and if the wood is wet, it means children. Quarrel: Seeing a quarrel in a dream for someone who quarrels means reconciliation for him, and quarrels. For those who were successful, worries and heartaches appear. Sedition may indicate temptation, and perhaps a reference to me, and it may indicate the invalidity of work, and the king’s temptation is a sign of pleasure. Preacher: Seeing a preacher in a dream is a sign of purity and it was said that it is repentance and piety. It also indicates the matter. With good and forbidding evil, it can indicate joy, meetings, and engaged couples in a dream. Bat: Seeing a bat in a dream indicates unemployment, and it is said that it indicates the end of fear, and a bat for a traveler does not deserve praise. A bat indicates the destruction of a house and is said to be a sign of the presence of a witch woman. A & crop: Seeing wine in a dream is forbidden, and drinking wine is a sign of sin, and perhaps wine indicates livelihood. Seeing wine in a dream for someone who is about to have a partner or get married is a sign of approval, and the age of wine is a sign of serving the Sultan. Dagger: Seeing a dagger in A dream means money and wealth, and seeing a knife entering the place where it is placed means marriage to a woman. Pig: Seeing a pig in a dream indicates the cursed enemy, the owner of the conspiracy, and riding a pig is a sign of a lot of money. Eating roasted pork is a sign of kindness and quick benefits. For the fortune teller.Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, letter Kha. See also many complete articles on the interpretation of dreams. Letter Kha. Engagement in a dream. Lamb in a dream. Bread in a dream. Interpretation of wine in a dream. Seeing a golden ring. Interpretation of cucumber in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of betrayal. Blood coming out of the letter.

title: Interpretation of a dream about death by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about death in a dream The dream of death is fear and anxiety for many people, and death is the last moments that a person lives before his death, because God Almighty created every soul and wrote a specific term for it, and death is inevitable for every human being present on the face of the earth...the face of the earth, and in this The article will point out the most prominent interpretations about seeing death and seeing death in a dream, and we will put it before you. There are many meanings and connotations for this vision. Interpretation scholars have worked hard to develop accurate connotations and interpretations of seeing death in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about death in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing death in reality frightens and worries many people, and seeing death in a dream carries many connotations and interpretations that he developed. Interpretation scholars, and below we will tell you the most prominent interpretations of a dream about death according to Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin believes that if someone sees himself dying and recites the Shahada in a dream, this is evidence of his faith and certainty in God Almighty. Seeing death while pronouncing the Shahada in a dream indicates the confidence that he feels It has the dreamer and his strength. If someone dreams that he is dying, then this dream can bring good news and can indicate bad things happening to the dreamer because of a certain person. Seeing death in a dream indicates the suffering that the dreamer is going through. See also: Interpretation of a dream about eating Chicken meat in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabul Interpretation of the dream of death and the pronunciation of the Shahada in the dream of single women. The dream of death in the dream of a single girl brings a lot of anxiety and fear. This vision carries many meanings and connotations, and this vision may have bad meanings and connotations. Below we will tell you the clearest indications and interpretations of this vision: If an unmarried girl sees herself dying in her dream, this indicates that she will get married soon. Seeing an unmarried girl dying in a dream screaming and crying means that the girl will be exposed to many problems and difficulties in her life. If she sees an unmarried girl dying in a dream, screaming and crying, it means that the girl will be exposed to many problems and difficulties in her life. A married woman whose lover dies and dies in a dream, is evidence of the collapse of worries and the end of crises. Seeing someone dying in a dream without a death ceremony means that that girl will enjoy a happy and good life. Seeing a girl dying in an unmarried girl’s dream and being able to pronounce the Shahada indicates the need to get closer The girl from God - Glory be to Him - Interpretation of a dream about death and pronouncing the Shahada in a dream for a married woman. Many people search for accurate interpretations of seeing a person dying in a dream, as the interpretation of this vision varies depending on the condition of the dreamer and the viewer of the vision. Below we will tell you the most important interpretations about seeing death and pronouncing the Shahada in a dream for a married woman: Seeing death and pronouncing the Shahada in a married woman’s dream indicates kindness and abundant living that the woman will soon have. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is dying and utters the Shahada, this is a sign of the future. The brightness that awaits her. Seeing death and pronouncing the Shahada in a married woman’s dream shows her love for goodness and purity of heart. title: Interpretation of the meaning of a dream about brides by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about brides by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Sirin, Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing brides in a dream, brides in a dream, the meaning of a dream about brides in a dream, the meaning of a dream about brides in a dream, the meaning of a dream about brides in a dream, to learn more on the Mohazat website, the interpretation of the meaning of a dream about brides in a dream, in this paragraph we talk about the interpretation of a dream The bride in a dream, interpretation of a dream about seeing a bride in a dream, interpretation of a dream about a bride, interpretation of a dream about seeing a bride. title: Learn about the interpretation of the plane symbol in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi flying a plane in a dream and flying a plane in a dream

preview.html: The symbol of an airplane in a dream: Is seeing an airplane good or bad? What are the negative symbols of dreaming about an airplane? What does a plane crash symbolize in a dream? In the following lines, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing an airplane for unmarried, married, pregnant, and divorced women, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Usaimi, and the leading interpretation scholars. The symbol of the airplane in a dream. Scientists interpreted riding a plane in a dream as evidence that the dreamer will immigrate abroad soon and obtain a wonderful job opportunity.. a good person and close to God. Almighty. It is said that boarding the plane symbolizes good morals, high status, and high standing, and if the plane lands in a familiar place, this means that the dreamer will soon receive guests in his home. The symbol of the plane in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted that he sees the plane as evidence of brilliance and success in work, If the dreamer has a certain desire, then the plane in his dream symbolizes his imminent fulfillment, and if the dreamer sees a huge plane in his dream, this indicates that he has reached a high practical level, and the small plane in the dream indicates that the small project that the dreamer has begun to implement will succeed and gain. A lot of money. If the dreamer is flying the plane, this leads to a promotion to a higher position at work soon. He achieves what he aspires to. The dream interpretation website on the Internet is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just write. The dream interpretation website on the Internet. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. The symbol of the plane in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Al-Osaimi sees that the plane landing in an unknown place in his dream is a sign of... The dreamer will soon undergo a different experience that will change the course of his life, and seeing an airplane in general indicates some golden opportunities that will soon be available to the dreamer in his work and the dream carries a message for him to seize it and not waste it. Traveling by plane with strangers is a sign of giving up on some people and things from In order to achieve ambitions and goals. The symbol of the plane in a single woman’s dream. If an unmarried woman rides a plane, this is a sign that her marriage contract must be with a distinguished and mature person who will treat her with kindness and gentleness. Scientists have interpreted the vision of riding a plane as a sign of tremendous development. Traveling abroad for work will happen in her life soon. The plane landing in the vision is a sign of the happiness and security that the dreamer enjoys with her current partner, and it may also be a sign that he will propose to her soon, but if the plane crashes, this symbolizes entering into a failed relationship, so the owner must The dream is to pay attention and not trust any man until he is sure of his feelings towards her. The symbol of the plane in a married woman’s dream. It is said that a plane crash in a dream is evidence of the failure of the marriage and the desire for divorce, but if the dreamer sees in her dream a plane flying in the sky, this indicates the good relationship that unites her. The partner, friendship, and common interests between them. If a married woman sees her partner riding a plane with an unknown woman, this is a sign of his betrayal. She must be careful. The plane falling in the vision.

title: Learn more about the interpretation of the takbir in a dream and hearing it

preview.html: Interpretation of hearing and seeing takbeer in a dream: takbeer is one of the things that reassures a person when he sees it in a dream. Because it is one of the means of drawing closer to God through a person’s remembrance of his Lord, so when a person grows up, it is likely to be interpreted as giving, traveling, self-realization, or that God Almighty. Repentance will be accepted after a sin, or the dreamer’s situation will change for the better for himself or his family, or for him to see the justice of his children, but growing up in a dream is always good. Interpretation of a dream about growing up in a dream is a big opening for the dreamer when he grows up for himself or hears the takbir, this indicates his good condition and his change from the path of sins to the path Repentance and abstaining from sins. If the dreamer says that Takbir al-Ihram and its family are with him, then this indicates the good conditions of the family, a change in their lives for the better, and the beginning of the path of getting closer to God (Glory be to Him). Takbir in an individual’s dream. Mentioning the name of God in a dream of an unmarried woman is generally considered one of Reassuring visions for her, and this vision is interpreted in particular according to the dreamer’s position in her life and the circumstances in which she is currently living. . May God protect her from mistreatment. What is worthy of praise in the vision is if she sees that she has grown up and then rain falls from the sky. The growth of an unmarried woman in the dream is a sign that she is one of the girls close to the Creator as she takes refuge in Him in all the ordeals of her life. The interpretation of this vision is that the occurrence of her expiation It should be increased daily as a kind of constant remembrance of God, and it is better to recite all praises in general. The takbir in a dream for a married woman. The takbir in a dream for a married woman is considered evidence of sustenance with a new baby, and this is one of the best types of sustenance, in addition to the fact that it is likely to be equal to the child. If a married woman hears takbir in a dream, this is evidence that she will obtain money or bring her closer to God. If a married woman hears takbir in her dream, this is a sign of happiness and her situation will change from one state to a better state. They are disagreements, and this is evidence that she will win her opinion or get what she wants. If a married woman says in a dream (Allahu Akbar), this means that her condition will always change to joy, and she will overcome all difficulties and problems and always feel joy and happiness. Eid Takbirat in a dream for a woman Married: Seeing Takbir in a married woman’s dream means that she has a wish while she is awake and begging God to fulfill it, and soon she will be amazed that her wish will come true. Perhaps the dreamer has young children and is praying to God to marry them, and this desire will come true soon, and each of them will find the right partner for his life. If she If she is sick or suffering from financial hardship, then relief is near after this dream. If her husband is sick and she prays to God to heal him and remove the pain of the disease from his body, the desire will be fulfilled and God will return him to her and his children in the best condition, as if he had not complained. never. Illness. If she desires a position and prays to the Most Gracious to make him one of her teams, then it is good news that she will occupy this position in the shortest possible time.

title: Find out the interpretation of the dream that Ibn Sirin enchanted me with

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that I am bewitched: There are many forms of magic and its effect on people. In terms of dreams, seeing the sleeper being bewitched can make him feel fearful and anxious and try to find an accurate explanation for what he saw, and in this article we will clarify the details. To calm the heart of the dreamer, read with us to find out. Interpretation of dreams that I am bewitched. Seeing the dreamer in a dream that he is suffering from bewitchment in the dream indicates the psychological disturbances that he will go through in his next life because he does not face his problems or solve them and is content with just staying away from them. He is patient until he overcomes the obstacles he faces in life and becomes a safe place from hatred and magic. A man who sees magic in a dream indicates that he will be exposed to an accident that may lead to his death, so he should pay attention and approach God Almighty to save him from danger and improve her life - it is also prosperity. Interpretation A dream that bewitched me Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a woman in a dream affected by magic symbolizes the weakness of her character in life, and her need for a healthy person to support her so that she can complete her life continuously without external influences, and magic in her. A woman’s dream shows her importance to her family and followers following in the footsteps of others and her interference in their lives, which may lead to her breaking up with her marriage if she does not change her bad personality. The dreamer seeing that he is bewitched in the dream indicates that he will enter into a materially and socially incompatible relationship and will be exposed to crises and must think carefully before Making fatal decisions. The Asrar Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Asrar Dream Interpretation website in Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of the dream: I am fascinated by single people. Seeing a girl in her dream affected by magic indicates her fear for the coming period of her future and her life due to the delay in her marriage and the unmarried woman’s feeling that she is under the influence of magic in the dream. . It indicates the adversity and obstacles that she faces on the path to her success, which prevent her from achieving her desires, but if the girl sees that she does not want to study and her ability to achieve academic achievement is less than it was in the past, this symbolizes that she will return to her Lord to please her and save her from danger. Seeing the dreamer suffering from witchcraft Or observing any of the professional symbols that conflict with Sharia and religion in a dream leads to bad news that you will learn in the coming days, and canceling the magic in the vision indicates that you will get rid of the haters and competitors around her until she returns to normal in her life. Interpretation of a dream that a married woman bewitched me: for a married woman to see herself In a dream, it symbolizes her husband’s support in her life so that she can achieve her dreams in the near future and is proud of what he does for her and his ability to provide her financial income and her children. It means that she has a high status in society. If the woman does not suffer from temptation or marital problems and she sees that she is under the influence of magic in the dream. This indicates her love for her husband and her desire to settle the differences between them because of a reason she cannot stay away from. Watching the woman see herself suffering from the power of magic that...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sea wave in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a sea wave in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin refers to seeing sea waves in a dream as a warning to the dreamer of the coming of sad and difficult moments in his life. Seeing calm sea waves in a dream is one of the visions that came as evidence of the stability of life and livelihood. Likewise, the sea without waves In a person’s dream, it indicates a life free of problems and tranquility. Do not always indicate and pretend that you see sea waves in a dream about frequent sins and sins and turning away from the affairs of God. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing shells in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sea waves in a dream for a single woman. Seeing sea waves in a dream for a single woman For a married woman, it indicates the beginning of achieving her desires and goals that she seeks. The calm and steady sea waves in a girl’s dream is a vision that portends a lot of goodness and nourishment. The interpretation of a dream about sea waves for a single woman could be the result of problems and sorrows that she feels in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a jellyfish. The sea in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about sea waves for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a raging sea and escaping from it for a married woman indicates that she will get rid of the problems she suffers from in her marriage. The calmness of the sea waves in her dream shows the calm and stability of her life with her husband. Seeing high and rising sea waves in a married woman’s dream is evidence of Her obedience to her husband and his love for her. The simple wave in her dreams indicates a change in life for the better and a stable and happy life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ship in a dream. Sea waves in a dream for a pregnant woman. The presence of sea waves in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of easy childbirth without fatigue or trouble. Also, seeing sea waves in a dream means an abundance of goodness for her, her husband, and her children. Sea waves in a pregnant woman’s dream are among the praiseworthy visions that may indicate that she will give birth easily and enjoy good health. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fishing in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sea waves in a dream. For a man: Seeing raging waves in a man’s dream may indicate a life full of worries and problems. Rising waves in a dream may indicate the fatigue and misery that the man will suffer in his next life. The fear of sea waves in a man’s dream indicates the approaching journey. It shows a change in the waves from rough to normal. He is freed from all the troubles and sorrows that he suffers from. The calmness of the sea waves that settle in men’s dreams is a sign of piety and piety. But often seeing sea waves in a dream is a sign of committing sins, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about calm sea wavesThe interpretation of seeing calm and beautiful sea waves In a dream, it appears to the dreamer good and great benefits for his life. Ibn Sirin also indicated that he sees calm sea waves for good and good circumstances and an indication of the end of worries. Also, seeing calm waves in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates material and moral stability. Raging sea waves in a dream is a vision. Raging waves in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer will fight some battles and die
